00049 typedef struct {
00050     struct list_head list; 
00051     ec_domain_t *domain; 
00052     ec_datagram_t datagrams[EC_MAX_NUM_DEVICES]; 
00053 #if EC_MAX_NUM_DEVICES > 1
00054     uint8_t *send_buffer;
00055 #endif
00056     unsigned int expected_working_counter; 
00057 } ec_datagram_pair_t;
